titleStmt.title: Nevvs from the north: or, A true relation of the affaires in those parts, and in Scotland. Being a letter sent to a friend from Penrith in Cumberland, the 23. of June, 1648. And published for the satisfaction of those that desire to be truly informed of the present condition of those places.
titleStmt.author: H. H.

notesStmt.note: The word "published" is preceded by a square bracket.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
